scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm run start" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm run start"
scripts.test: (cd client && npm run test) && (cd server && npm run test)
scripts.lint:dev: (cd client && npm run lint) && (cd server && npm run lint)
scripts.test:dev: (cd client && npm run test) && (cd server && npm run test)

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint:dev && npm run test:dev
